title: Nenje Nenje Lyrics Ratchagan
stanzas:
nenje nenje marandhu vidu.
ninaivinai kadandhu vidu.
nenje nenje urangi vidu
nijangalai thurandhu vidu.

kangalai vitruththan oviyamaa
venneeril meengal thoongumaa
kanneeril kaadhal vaazhumaa

nenje nenje marandhu vidu.
ninaivinai kadandhu vidu.
nenje nenje urangi vidu
nijangalai thurandhu vidu.

penne penne unn valaiyal
enakkoru vilangallavo
kaatrukku sirai ennavo

thanmaanaththin
thalaiyai vitru
kaadhalin vaal vaangavo
kanmoodi naan vaazhavo

unnai enni mul viriththu
padukkavum pazhagik konden.
ennil yaarum kallerindhaal
sirikkavum pazhagik konden.

ullaththai maraiththen
uyir vali poruththen en
suyaththai edhuvo
suttadhadi vandhen

nenje nenje nerungi vidu
nigazhndhadhai marandhu vidu
nenje nenje negizhndhu vidu
nijangalil kalandhu vidu

katti vaiththa kaatre
vandhu vidu
kaigal rendai yaendhinen..
kaadhal pichchai ketkiren
nenje nenje
nenje nenje..
nenje nenje..

anbe anbe nee prinidhaal
kangalil mazhai varume
kaatrenai kai vidume.

vidhai azhidhu sedi varume
sippigal udaiththa pinne
muththukkal kai varume

nenje nenje nerungi vidu
nigazhndhadhai marandhu vidu
nenje nenje negizhndhu vidu
nijangalil kalandhu vidu

katti vaiththa kaatre
vandhu vidu
kaigal rendai yaendhinen..
kaadhal pichchai ketkiren
nenje nenje
nenje nenje..
nenje nenje..
